desc: We make our noodles fresh, daily, in the heart of LA. We make Udons, Ramen, Chow Mein, Yakisoba...etc.

layout.text: We have been manufacturing fresh, delicious, hand-packed noodles for over 30 years, and they are available all over the U.S., Canada, and Mexico. Our noodles are enjoyed in many restaurants, and they can be purchased at your local grocery stores and supermarkets.
